description:
There are great opportunities ahead for Berkeley students to participate in the new XPRIZE for Carbon Removal. The Berkeley Carbon Removal Network will hold a one-hour Zoom gathering on May 24, 3-4pm, to outline the competition, call out the important dates and talk about what the XPRIZE judges REALLY want from the winning teams, and support student engagement.

Learn all about the XPRIZE and meet potential student collaborators and supportive faculty.

The meeting will be co-hosted by Marjorie Went (Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering) and Bruce Riordan (BCRN).

\
Learn more about the [XPRIZE](https://www.xprize.org/prizes/elonmusk), a $100 million competition aimed at tackling the biggest threat facing humanity - fighting climate change and rebalancing Earthâ€™s carbon cycle.
title: XPRIZE for Carbon Removal
